results.name: Sequence related to Kashaev's invariant for the (7,2)-torus knot.
comment: This is sequence b_n(7) in Table 2 of Hikami 2003.
link: K. Hikami, Volume Conjecture and Asymptotic Expansion of q-Series, Experimental Mathematics Vol. 12, Issue 3 (2003).
results.author: _Peter Bala_, Mar 01 2012
